roleset.name: cook by applying steam
roleset.note: STEAM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'steam' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 45.3 and 43.4, Framenet entry Apply heat. (from steam.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: down home cooking
example.text: John steamed 20 pounds of Brussels sprouts for dinner.

roleset.name: emit steam
roleset.note: STEAM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'steam' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 45.3 and 43.4, Framenet entry Apply heat. (from steam.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: like a volcano
example.text: John's coffee steamed, then exploded in his face.

roleset.name: manner of motion
roleset.note: STEAM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'steam' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 45.3 and 43.4, Framenet entry Apply heat. (from steam.03-v predicate notes)

example.name: full steam ahead!
example.text: Instead, the rally only paused for about 25 minutes and then steamed forward as institutions resumed buying.
